resources.string:
This application is a simple Grade Point Calculator that enables you calculate Grade Point semester by semester and save to be updated and accessed later on.

The scale used in this application is a 5.0 scale.

Grade Point ratings.

  • 4.5 to 5.0 is a first class.

  • 3.5 to 4.49 is a second class upper.

  • 2.5 to 3.49 is a second class lower.

  • 1.5 to 2.49 is a third class.

  • 0 to 1.49 is a pass degree.

 

You can contact developer through ebukaikenwa0902@gmail.com
